message: Bob, I'm pleased to offer you this valuable product. Given its worth to you, I believe a price of $1,400,000 would be fair for both of us. It's a significant investment, but I'm confident you'll see the value it brings.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your valuation of the product. However, given my budget constraints, I am only able to consider a price of $1,300,000. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Bob, I understand your budget concerns. While I'm willing to be flexible, $1,300,000 is a bit below my minimum acceptable price. To bridge the gap, I'm willing to come down to $1,350,000. I believe this price is still very fair, considering the value this product brings to your business.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering the current market conditions and my financial situation, I am unable to meet your price of $1,350,000. I would like to propose a price of $1,320,000. I hope this proposal will be more in line with what we can agree upon.
